title: A right exelent and pleasaunt dialogue, betwene Mercury and an English souldier contayning his supplication to Mars: bevvtified with sundry worthy histories, rare inuentions, and politike deuises. wrytten by B. Rich: gen. 1574.
author: Rich, Barnabe, 1540?-1617.
publisher: J. Day] These bookes are to be sold [by H. Disle] at the corner shop, at the South west doore of Paules church,
